title: Space Love Me
description:
Description :
        Love You From Space/Ji Gyubin had the superpower of reading other people's minds. One day, he met Yoo Byeol, a new transfer student who was actually an alien disguised as a human. Yoo Byeol had been sent to assess humanity's survival. Problem was, she hated humans! Gyubin wanted to change Byeol's heart in order to prevent the destruction of humanity. Along that journey, strange emotions would arise between the two, and an unexpected romance between a human and an alien would begin. The time that decided the fate of humanity was approaching Could Gyubin achieve both love and humanity's survival?Maybe you like !
